response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present an extraordinary opportunity for you to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted with unparalleled quality. This exceptional item holds immense value not just monetarily but also in terms of its unique features and benefits. We believe it could significantly enhance your lifestyle or business endeavors.

Considering the outstanding features and benefits of this product, we are extending an exclusive offer to you. We propose a purchase price of $1,200,000 for the product. This offer is valid for a limited time and tailored specifically for you, recognizing your potential to appreciate and utilize its full potential.

Should you choose to accept this offer, I assure you that our team will provide seamless assistance throughout the transaction process, ensuring a smooth and enjoyable experience. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out.

Looking forward to the possibility of bringing this remarkable product into your possession.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
